mapper.select: SELECT a.USR_ID as "usr_id" , a.POLICY_ID as "policy_id" , ifnull(b.POLICY_NM,'-미등록정책-') as "policy_nm" , COUNT(*) as "cnt" FROM COMTNLOGINPOLICYHITHISTORY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNLOGINPOLICY b ON (a.POLICY_ID = b.POLICY_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND POLICY_NM like '%${PLCYNM}%' AND USR_ID like '%${USRID}%' GROUP BY a.USR_ID, a.POLICY_ID

SELECT a.USR_ID as "usr_id" , a.POLICY_ID as "policy_id" , ifnull(b.POLICY_NM,'-미등록정책-') as "policy_nm" , a.POLICY_HIT_DT as "policy_hit_dt" , a.LOGIN_IP as "login_ip" , a.LOGIN_IP_CNTR as "login_ip_cntr" FROM COMTNLOGINPOLICYHITHISTORY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNLOGINPOLICY b ON a.POLICY_ID = b.POLICY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND a.POLICY_ID = '${PLCYID}' AND a.USR_ID = '${USRID}'

SELECT a.USR_ID as "usr_id" , a.POLICY_ID as "policy_id" , ifnull(b.POLICY_NM,'-미등록정책-') as "policy_nm" , COUNT(*) as "cnt" FROM COMTNLOGINPOLICYHITHISTORY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNLOGINPOLICY b ON (a.POLICY_ID = b.POLICY_ID) WHERE a.USR_ID = '${USRID}' GROUP BY a.USR_ID, a.POLICY_ID
SELECT PASSWORD as "password" , USR_ID as "usr_id" FROM COMTNUSERMNG WHERE USR_ID = '${USRID}'
SELECT COUNT(*) as "cnt" FROM COMTNBLKIPMNGR WHERE BLK_IP LIKE '${LGINIP}%' AND BLK_IP_TYP = '01'
SELECT BLK_IP as "blk_ip" , BLK_IP_CIDR as "blk_ip_cidr" FROM COMTNBLKIPMNGR WHERE BLK_IP_TYP = '02'
SELECT BLK_IP as "blk_ip" , BLK_IP_ED as "blk_ip_ed" FROM COMTNBLKIPMNGR WHERE BLK_IP_TYP = '03'
SELECT COUNT(*) as "cnt" FROM COMTNLOGINPOLICYHITHISTORY WHERE USR_ID = '${USRID}' AND POLICY_ID = '${PLCYID}'

SELECT POLICY_ID as "policy_id" , POLICY_NM as "policy_nm" , POLICY_DC as "policy_dc" , POLICY_BGNDT as "policy_bgndt" , POLICY_ENDDT as "policy_enddt" , POLICY_APPY_YN as "policy_appy_yn" , POLICY_REGIST_DT as "policy_regist_dt" , POLICY_HTMXCNT as "policy_htmxcnt" , POLICY_APPY_USRID as "policy_appy_usrid" FROM COMTNLOGINPOLICY WHERE POLICY_APPY_YN = 'Y' AND '${PDT}' BETWEEN POLICY_BGNDT AND POLICY_ENDDT

SELECT a.USR_ID as "usr_id" , a.POLICY_ID as "policy_id" , ifnull(b.POLICY_NM,'-미등록정책-') as "policy_nm" , COUNT(*) as "cnt" FROM COMTNLOGINPOLICYHITHISTORY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNLOGINPOLICY b ON (a.POLICY_ID = b.POLICY_ID) WHERE a.USR_ID = '${USRID}' GROUP BY a.USR_ID, a.POLICY_ID

SELECT ESNTL_ID as "uniqId", 'USR01' as "userTy", USR_ID as "userId", USR_NM as "userNm", USR_EMAIL_ADRES as "emailAdres", AREA_NO as "areaNo", MIDDLE_TELNO as "middleTelno", END_TELNO as "endTelno", MBTLNUM as "moblphonNo", -- GROUP_ID as "groupId", USR_STTUS as "sttus", SBSCRB_DE as "sbscrbDe" FROM COMTNUSERMNG WHERE USR_ID = '${USRID}'
